title: Is LoL having some issues or is my internet going welfare broken mode
body:
The Ping flys to 180 and the fps drops to 40. I cant exactly play like this and its starting to piss me off. God knows how we played in the American servers, but this is basically almost impossible to deal with,

BigPond the Jewws are stating its not coming from there side, so is it the client or my shitty PC (although, i never had problems before).

replies.body: if your getting proplems when your phone rings then you might want to get off Dial-Up

you may have unstable cabling, is this brief interruptions or extended periods of time or even when the phones rings or you get a fax. if you ring up telstra they are obliged to send out a technician to test your cabling free of charge but i have noticed things like this have been a lot more prevalent since previous patches

defo been having the same problem since 3.9 Patch. Became a lot more common and worse after 4.20. My ping normally sits around 27, but can rump up to 200 for no reason, and i know its not a bandwidth issue my end.

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bhOzgNyK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T18:49:54.101+0000)
>
> defo been having the same problem since 3.9 Patch. Became a lot more common and worse after 4.20. My ping normally sits around 27, but can rump up to 200 for no reason, and i know its not a bandwidth issue my end.

Same can happen for me from 50 to around 300, but I do get problems with other people in my house hogging bandwidth sometimes and stuff like that, so anything I say might be a bit wrong.
